Articles.Content:
I notced that ad a certain level each star setting give only certain contracts

Im ad the moment quite in the beginning of a 10% game. so I'm hunting for science. I have only the first three sciences and haven't done any orbit contracts.

the contracts i get are for one star tourists suborbital 25%, vip to suborbital 25%, in admosphere part testing 1%, visual survey's 24% and cheap rescue missions 25%.

for two stars i get 95% rescue kerbal, 4% visual survey's and maybe 1% part testing.

three stars is stil orbit kerbin

what you get is probably depending on a lot of thing science/reputation/what has been done.

I would have noticed this if it weren't for the amount of rescue kerbals i got ( not having been in orbit nor upgraded my tracking station.)

ps

if some one know a way to reduce the amount of rescue missions, I would be pleased to know.
you can always decline missions; that gets rid of rescue missions if you don't want to do them.
One of the changes from 1.0 -> 1.0.1 was to reduce rescue contracts and increase station contracts, I think.
